item.title: My [SRL]Autotalker
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

Hey,ive made an autotalker and is pretty much done,before i post i would like to thank skys shadow for helping me with the forms on here.Post any problems or suggestions for my script.

[code]program autotalker;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

var
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Label2 : TLabel;
Label3 : TLabel;
Label4 : TLabel;
Label5 : TLabel;
Label6 : TLabel;
Label7 : TLabel;
Edit1 : TEdit;
Edit2 : TEdit;
Edit3 : TEdit;
Edit4 : TEdit;
Edit5 : TEdit;
Edit6 : TEdit;
Edit7 : TEdit;
Edit8 : TEdit;
Button1 : TButton;
Label8 : TLabel;
msg1, msg2, msg3, msg4, msg5 : String;

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + ‘.’;
frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
end;

procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 250;
frmDesign.Top := 114;
frmDesign.Width := 284;
frmDesign.Height := 361;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘Archerer98’#39’s Autotalker’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 151;
Label1.Top := 17;
Label1.Width := 73;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := ‘Message 1 (F1)’;
Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label2.Parent := frmDesign;
Label2.Left := 151;
Label2.Top := 41;
Label2.Width := 73;
Label2.Height := 13;
Label2.Caption := ‘Message 2 (F2)’;
Label3 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label3.Parent := frmDesign;
Label3.Left := 151;
Label3.Top := 65;
Label3.Width := 73;
Label3.Height := 13;
Label3.Caption := ‘Message 3 (F3)’;
Label4 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label4.Parent := frmDesign;
Label4.Left := 151;
Label4.Top := 90;
Label4.Width := 73;
Label4.Height := 13;
Label4.Caption := ‘Message 4 (F4)’;
Label5 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label5.Parent := frmDesign;
Label5.Left := 151;
Label5.Top := 114;
Label5.Width := 73;
Label5.Height := 13;
Label5.Caption := ‘Message 5 (F5)’;
Label6 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label6.Parent := frmDesign;
Label6.Left := 151;
Label6.Top := 163;
Label6.Width := 48;
Label6.Height := 13;
Label6.Caption := ‘Username’;
Label7 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label7.Parent := frmDesign;
Label7.Left := 151;
Label7.Top := 187;
Label7.Width := 46;
Label7.Height := 13;
Label7.Caption := ‘Password’;
Label8 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label8.Parent := frmDesign;
Label8.Left := 151;
Label8.Top := 211;
Label8.Width := 22;
Label8.Height := 13;
Label8.Caption := ‘Nick’;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Left := 25;
Edit1.Top := 17;
Edit1.Width := 121;
Edit1.Height := 21;
Edit1.TabOrder := 8;
Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit2.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit2.Left := 25;
Edit2.Top := 41;
Edit2.Width := 121;
Edit2.Height := 21;
Edit2.TabOrder := 9;
Edit3 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit3.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit3.Left := 25;
Edit3.Top := 65;
Edit3.Width := 121;
Edit3.Height := 21;
Edit3.TabOrder := 10;
Edit4 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit4.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit4.Left := 25;
Edit4.Top := 90;
Edit4.Width := 121;
Edit4.Height := 21;
Edit4.TabOrder := 11;
Edit5 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit5.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit5.Left := 25;
Edit5.Top := 114;
Edit5.Width := 121;
Edit5.Height := 21;
Edit5.TabOrder := 12;
Edit6 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit6.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit6.Left := 25;
Edit6.Top := 162;
Edit6.Width := 121;
Edit6.Height := 21;
Edit6.TabOrder := 13;
Edit7 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit7.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit7.Left := 25;
Edit7.Top := 187;
Edit7.Width := 121;
Edit7.Height := 21;
Edit7.TabOrder := 14;
Edit7.PasswordChar:= ‘*’;
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.Left := 25;
Button1.Top := 245;
Button1.Width := 75;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Caption := ‘Start!’;
Button1.ModalResult := 1;
Button1.TabOrder := 15;
Edit8 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit8.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit8.Left := 25;
Edit8.Top := 211;
Edit8.Width := 121;
Edit8.Height := 21;
Edit8.TabOrder := 16;
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

procedure inputplayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers := 1;
numberofplayers (HowManyPlayers);
currentplayer := 0;

players[0].Name :=Edit6.Text; //username
players[0].Pass :=Edit7.Text; //password
players[0].Nick :=Edit8.Text; //nick
players[0].Active :=true; //do not touch

end;

procedure talk;
begin
if(isFKeydown(1))then
begin
TypeSend(msg1 + chr(10))
end;
end;

procedure autotalk2;
begin
if(isFKeydown(2))then
begin
Typesend(msg2 + chr(10))
end;
end;

procedure autotalk3;
begin
if(isFKeydown(3))then
begin
Typesend(msg3 + chr(10))
end;
end;

procedure autotalk4;
begin
if(isFKeydown(4))then
begin
Typesend(msg3 + chr(10))
end;
end;

procedure switch;
begin
if(isFKeydown(5))then
begin
logout;
NextPlayer(true);
end;
end;

procedure alltalk;
begin
msg1:=Edit1.Text;
msg2:=Edit2.Text;
msg3:=Edit3.Text;
msg4:=Edit4.Text;
msg5:=Edit5.Text;
repeat
switch;
talk;
autotalk2;
autotalk3;
autotalk4;
until (false)
end;

procedure aantiban;
var
Antiban2 : integer;
begin
if(not(loggedin))then exit;
Antiban2 := random(130);
case Antiban2 of
1:RandomRClickEvery(2+Random(30));
2:hoverskill(‘attack’,false);
3:hoverskill(‘mining’,false);
4:hoverskill(‘random’,false);
5:DoEmote(random(30));
6:RotateEvery(30+Random(5));
end;
end;

begin
setupsrl;
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
activateclient;
inputplayers;
loginplayer;
wait(5);
repeat
alltalk;
wait(5000)
until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
